message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.HC, cs.SI 

This paper discusses the issue of XSS vulnerabilities in web applications and proposes a solution using OWASP ESAPI output encoding. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the sub-categories of Computer Security (cs.CR), Software Engineering (cs.SE), Programming Languages (cs.PL), Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC), and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI).
